description: Ant-Man (Scott Lang) is a fictional character, a superhero featured in the American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He is the second superhero character to use the name Ant-Man in the Marvel Universe after Hank Pym. He is a reformed thief and an electronics expert. Paul Rudd will portray Scott Lang in the upcoming Marvel Studios film, Ant-Man, set to be released on July 17, 2015.
name: Ant-Man (Eric O'Grady)
powers: Maintains normal strength in shrunken state
